author: taylor
msg: its getting increasing harder to test jetui customizations without a set of unit tests on the rest operations (we did have a test suite for ajax operations)

author: jbellis
msg: productize mmap approach: handle files > 2GB by chunking w/ fallback to BRAF
when a row crosses chunk boundaries (you don't want to have to check for crossing
boundary in each read() call, or you'll almost certainly waste more time than
the BRAF approach); add retrying-delete to wait for mmapped files to be unmapped
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Brandon Williams and goffinet for CASSANDRA-408

author: jbellis
msg: Implement FileDataInput with MappedFileDataInput, backed by a mmap'd ByteBuffer.
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Brandon Williams and goffinet for CASSANDRA-408

author: jbellis
msg: patch by jbellis; reviewed by Brandon Williams and goffinet for CASSANDRA-408
